original_text: He built the House of the Forest of Lebanon. Its length was a hundred cubits and its breadth fifty cubits and its height thirty cubits, and it was built on four rows of cedar pillars, with cedar beams on the pillars.
korean_text: 그가 레바논 나무로 왕궁을 지었으니 길이가 백 규빗이요 너비가 오십 규빗이요 높이가 삼십 규빗이라 백향목 기둥이 네 줄이요 기둥 위에 백향목 들보가 있으며

sentences.original_text: He built the House of the Forest of Lebanon.
Its length was a hundred cubits
and it was built on four rows of cedar pillars
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 네 줄의 백향목 기둥 위에 세워졌으며

sentences.original_text: with cedar beams on the pillars.
